item.title: Notes on Blindness review - complex, imaginative and deeply intelligent
item.description:
Notes on Blindness review - complex, imaginative and deeply intelligent

Related: Notes on Blindness: the film about losing sight, but gaining vision Notes on Blindness is a filmic essay in biography in the verbatim-cinema style famously used by Clio Barnard in her 2010 movie The Arbor: a complex, imaginative, deeply considered adaptation of the 1990 book Touching the Rock by John M Hull, an Australian-born theologian resident at the University of Birmingham, who wrote about his experience of going, and then being blind.

item.title: Experiencing Virtual Reality In A Full Body Vibrating 'Synesthesia Suit'
item.description:
Experiencing Virtual Reality In A Full Body Vibrating 'Synesthesia Suit'

During a visit to SIGGRAPH 2016, I was surprised to encounter one of my all-time favorite PlayStation 2 games. Rez is a synesthesia-themed on-rails shooter that was released in 2001 at the height of the collision of videogaming and electronic dance music culture.

item.title: Learning from History - GHVR
item.description:
Learning from History - GHVR

THE MAN WHO FELL TO EARTH Twenty-five years ago, I founded Ono-Sendai, the first tech startup working to develop a consumer virtual reality system. By the time you added up all of the component costs for the graphics supercomputer, positional tracking equipment and head-mounted display, back in 1991 even basic VR kit would cost over a quarter million dollars.

item.title: 100+ top brands and people from the virtual reality community - Haptic.al

100+ top brands and people from the virtual reality community Are you trying to explore the fast growing virtual reality industry but exactly don't know where to start? Here is a list that may come in handy. Below you can browse 100+ Twitter handles of brands, products services and people from the VR industry.

item.title: Google presents Beyond the Map
item.description:
Google presents Beyond the Map

Google takes you inside the unexpected world of the favelas. Come with us on an interactive 360Â° walk inside Rio's comunidades to meet some truly inspiring people.

item.title: Looking Back at Sci-Fi Literature That Predicted Modern VR Tech
item.description:
Looking Back at Sci-Fi Literature That Predicted Modern VR Tech

With the introduction of top-end devices such as the Oculus Rift and the HTC Vive as well as the simple ones such as Google Cardboard, Virtual Reality is the next digital frontier. While it's a world that can now be practically realized, it's not a new idea: Science Fiction has long been imagining virtual worlds within imagined ones.

item.title: Is VR becoming mainstream already?
item.description:
Is VR becoming mainstream already?

For decades, porn has been blamed for creating unrealistic sexual expectations, and for some addicts, it's impacted the ability to have healthy sexual relationships in the real world. Now one adult entertainment company is using virtual reality - and one of the hottest porn stars out there - to teach guys how to have better sex, both for their own benefit and the benefit of their partner.
